course_title: Graduate Communication Skills for Multilingual Learners I
class_notes: This non-credit course is required for English language learners in order to graduate.  It must be taken in the first semester at RSPH.  The goal of the course is to enhance English language skills, graduate level writing skills, presentation skills, and professional communication skills.  This course meets for two hours a week in person and there is an additional asynchronous hour.  All incoming international students must register for this course unless they received an exemption from Hannah Nicol.
